section.title: Upgrade JBoss Developer Studio
section.para: It is not possible to upgrade an existing JBoss Developer Studio installation to JBoss Developer Studio 7 because they are based on different versions of Eclipse. For example, JBoss Developer Studio 6 is based on Eclipse Juno (4.2) but JBoss Developer Studio 7 is based on Eclipse Kepler (4.3).
To use JBoss Developer Studio 7, you must download and run the universal installer available from the Customer Service Portal at .

note.para: You can use different versions of JBoss Developer Studio alongside each other by installing them in different directories.
